entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Paulatuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:10 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Paulatuk Airport 09:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: S 58 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind south 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:08 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 08:08 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:08 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
